plugin.name: idle
plugin._long: A plugin for idle settings, such as the screensaver and DPMS.

option.name: toggle
option._long: Disables the compositor going idle with the specified activator. Pressing again reactivates.

option.name: screensaver_timeout
option._long: Displays the screensaver after the specified seconds of inactivity. Setting the value to **-1** disables the screensaver.

option.name: dpms_timeout
option._long: Enters power saving mode after the specified seconds of inactivity. Setting the value to **-1** disables power saving.

option.name: cube_zoom_speed
option._long: Sets the zoom speed. The speed means how long it will take from the time the screensaver starts to the time the cube reaches `idle.cube_max_zoom`.

option.name: cube_rotate_speed
option._long: Sets the speed rotation of the cube.
